title: I want to buy your N173
author: packs

posts.post_title: I want to buy your N173
posts.post_content: Please, help a guy out. I'd love to buy your N173 cabinet. If you're looking to sell please do send me a PM with a scan and a price.

posts.post_title: N173  Old Judge Cards  Saco River
posts.post_content: I purchase Pop Smith  SGC 60 from the Saco River Auction where the King Kelly went for $70,000----I paid $3300 for mine--beautiful card---highest grade---I will be taking the card to the Boston Show this weekend---Don

Hi Don,

Thanks a lot for the reply. That's a little out of my price range. I'm working with a budget of $2,500.

Thanks a lot.
